reviews.review_text: Michael and the Prettech Canada team were fantastic partners when purchasing some equipment to start up our farm distillery in Ontario. Speaking as a very small scale player, I was amazed at how generous Michael was with his time in guiding me towards the right equipment solutions. The team was quick to respond, flexible with my needs, and overall enjoyable to work with. Looking forward to partnering with Prettech again in the future as we scale up our business.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Congratulations up coming opening, Im on standby if I can assist. Ryan, i appreciate the kind review.

reviews.review_text: I have had the pleasure of working with Michael and Prettech Canada over the last year. Not only is the equipment exceptional but the service is fantastic as well. Michael does extensive work to ensure you have the right equipment for the job. Multiple times he has come to my facility, and gathered all the information I needed for my space. He is an invaluable asset to my company and would recommend him to anyone looking to get in the brewing or distillation space.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Exceptional client, thank you for the kind review Peter. Im looking forward to your continued success nice work!

reviews.review_text: As the General Manager for Pure Spirits Inc, I have had the pleasure of dealing with Michael Chaplin of Prettech Canada since the summer of 2022. His company has provided exceptional support and direction in order to help us achieve our goals. We look forward to continuing our collaboration for years to come, and highly recommend his company and services!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Nino

reviews.review_text: We hired Prettech Canada to design our custom stainless  ethanol holding tanks, as well as install a new production still at our distillery in Delhi, ON.  From the very start Michael was available for us almost around the clock any always had the answers to keep our project moving in the right direction.  The engineering team brought our vision to a reality.  We would highly recommend this company and will use them exclusively in all of our future distillery expansion projects.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Brilliant thank you for the nice words Joel. Ive enjoyed working with you and your team. Its truly a pleasure working with a winning team of for thinkers. Nice work

reviews.review_text: I ve had the opportunity to work with Prettech Canada on brewhouse system engineering and quality assurance. Exceptional attention to detail, and some of the best welds i ve seen around. The team was a pleasure to work with, friendly and personable. Spent some time with CEO Mike who goes out of his way to ensure customer success. Kudos!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Jonathan, Ive enjoyed working with you & look forward to some fun projects in the future.

reviews.review_text: I purchased a small brewery system from Mike from Prettech Canada and so far have been satisfied by the craftmanship of the builds and impressed by the service from the company. Also the care of securing the products within the container, to make sure it arrives in perfect condition. Mike was easily accessible for getting information and pass it to me right away.  He goes above and beyond the scope of service for me.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the opportunity to earn your trust and business Clayton, its truly been a pleasure. Please let me know if and when I can assit you and your team with anything. Looking forward to stopping over for a Cold one. :)

reviews.review_text: We have the fortune to be located close to Prettech Canada and thus we have experienced the outstanding customer service long before the delivery of the equipment. Michael has provided useful suggestions, recommendations, physical help and even tools to tackle and solve many of the challenges associated with the entire process and not only limited to the equipment delivery and installation. Recently the equipment was delivered and we were highly impressed with the quality of the manufacturing and the attention to details. All this combined with competitive pricing make, in our opinion, Prettech Canada the number 1 choice in brewing equipment.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Enrico, it was a pleasure working with you. I really like your location and its been a fun project. :)

reviews.review_text: Had the pleasure of collaborating with Prettech Canada on a project. Their level of professionalism and pride in their craftsmanship and work is top-notch. You can be 100% sure you are in good hands with Prettech. Look forward to working with them again in the future.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Kris is the owner of  Attention to Detail and thats an understatement his craftsmanship is amazing he put a mere polish on some copper tanks that had them piping with brilliance. I can hardly wait to work with his team again! If your looking for prompt service and a keen eye for detail Kris is your man!

reviews.review_text: Michael and I have worked together since long before the conception of Prettech Canada. Watching him grow the business has been a real treat. Integrity is important to him and he puts everything he has into his business. Prettech Canada provides amazing brewing equipment, and quality customer service. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to start or expand a brewery.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words Paul.

reviews.review_text: As a wine and spirit consultant, I deeply appreciate quality, reliability and creativity. Prettech Canada has always provided me with excellent service, invaluable to the needs of my clients. This includes custom-made equipment including mash-tun, fermentation tanks, pumps, cooling unit etc. Lead time is good, with a genuine support for each request. I highly recommend Michael and Prettech Canada to any new or existing customers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Laurent, Im happy to help any time your welcome to call me 7 days a week Im up until midnight. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: I have been working with Prettech Canada for quite some time now. I just have to say that it has been an amazing experience through and through. Mike is excellent at networking and delivering results. His resources astound me! Better yet, he hires local agents, bringing jobs to the US. Not many companies can say that theae days. I would absolutely recommend Prettech Canada to anyone looking to start a brewery, or even expand on an existing business!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jacob

reviews.review_text: Worked with Mike and his team at Prettech designing 6 -- 5000L jacketed tanks for wine.  Upon seeing the collaborative finished design I was impressed with the quality of work and the attention to detail.  For instance, a little hook was welded to the tank near the mast to hold the bar that swivels the mast.  This was not requested but was a nice touch. For travel across the ocean they arrived rather quickly, installation wasnt too complicated, cooling system was plumbed and we were up and running. When there is the next expansion phase  Prettech will get a call.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for you rave review Mike its a pleasure working with a high level pro it makes our job a lot easier at Prettech Canada.

reviews.review_text: We recently purchased a 10BBL brewery from Prettech Canada and have been very pleased with the quality of the product and the workmanship. We had a few minor  issues along the way but Michael was able to resolve these problems in a timely manner and see us through till we were completely satisfied.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow thanks for the Steller review Rhys

reviews.review_text: Have worked with Michael and Prettech Canada for years. Not only could you not ask for better brewing equipment and advice but Mike and the team go out of their way to make sure clients are happy. Wonderful people and help. Thanks for everything and I look forward to many more years of success!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Matthew, Im passionate about the craft & working with people just like you and look forward to many more years of diligence! Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Ordered a pair of brite tanks from Michael and couldnt be happier. Very competitive pricing and great customer service. Michael picks up the phone and responds very promptly which made the whole process run smoothly. Will definitely be ordering from them in the future!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ryan, we focus on perfection on our welds and sanitary finishes. I look forward to engineering your next project. As a repeat client you will enjoy a discount. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: I was contacted almost immediately after requesting a quote. Even after explaining that I was a brewing student working on a project planning a brewery, Mike was still happy to help. In fact, he gave me multiple quotes and plans for different sizes of equipment, as part of the project involves scaling up. He even connected me with industry people in my area. I will definitely be contacting him if I am ever planning a brewery in the future.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Grants is a high-level student from the Olds College Beer Program. He has a drive that is compelling and belongs to this industry. His forward approach is noteworthy and I look forward to trying his wears. Ill also be looking forward to seeing and tasting some of your future-orientated award-winning beers! Cheers

reviews.review_text: We just started our cidery in July. Michael was excellent in his approach to our needs and he had a genuine interest in our success. His follow up was in a timely manner and his support continues to this day. Thank you Michael and Prettech Canada !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Boyd, Ive enjoyed working with your team. Please reach out if I can be of assistance. Cheers Michael

reviews.review_text: Had some tough brewing questions and issues and Prettech Canada helped me work through them all. Not only did I get the custom tanks I needed but also the expert advice I was looking for. Thanks to Michael and his team for taking great care me. I could not have asked for anything more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Matt, feel free to contact me anytime. Im often up late working with my engineers so if you have any tough questions Ill figure it out. I really enjoy helping

reviews.review_text: Mike and the Prettech team are great at what they do. Everything from their manufacturing and customer service is phenomenal.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Gaurav, thank your for your 3rd procurement Ive really enjoyed working with you and the Maan Farms & Estate Winery projects over the years. I appreciate what you bring to the table, Im happy to assist anytime!

reviews.review_text: I purchased 2 fermentation vessels @Prettech  Canada. Michael was prompt and reliable. Im looking forward for our next purchase.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: My Pleasure Maria, I welcome your procurement anytime

reviews.review_text: Very best company prettech Canada inc. I appreciate this company work. High recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Madusanka, thank you for the kind words, if you can use any further assistance from engineering my team are at your disposal! I had my senior engineer send you a compressive 3-D  diagram for your still assembly today.

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend! Excellent service, great results.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words im happy to help anytime!

reviews.review_text: DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES USE THIS COMPANY!!!   Please learn from my mistake and others.  Very poor customer relations.  Fermentation tank welds are not ground.  Mike doesnt understand equipment configuration.  This WILL be your worst mistake.  They are outside of the USA and thus out of your reach for recourse after problems occur.  My brewery is up and running thanks to Stout Tanks and Kettles ability to provide good quality equipment at a good price.  Mike is a CON MAN.  You have been warned.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Craig, I am very sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with us. This is not a typical experience with Prettech Canada. Every piece of a equipment is checked and double checked to ensure the best quality product, prior to shipping. These checks do include welds. At Prettech Canada we pride ourselves on the quality of the product we provide to our customers. Stout is a well known company and a solid competitor for smaller equipment. I am very glad that they were able to take care of your business needs. Stout Tanks and Kettles has a great reputation. Stout does ship from China. I think that every American and Canadian business would love to have North American based assembly. Given that you love your new tanks, you can see that outsourced assembly does not inherently indicate poor quality. It does however allow companies like Stout Tanks and Kettles to offer prices that are more reasonable for a business such as yours. When we last spoke, I was not aware that your complaint included welding issues. Please feel free to reach out to me directly to address your concerns in more detail. Happy Brewing!

reviews.review_text: Mike hired us to do some Warranty Repairs for a client in Cold Lake. The tank was severely cracked and a lot of time went into repairing it. We had verbal authorization from Michael to go ahead with each step. They have not to this date paid their bill to us and the do not answer any of our attempts to contact them. Be wary - they dont pay.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Shawna, sorry to learn your still having problems with Prettech Asia honoring there repair bill. I left there firm 1.5 years ago for that exact reason. You are correct they do not pay hence me moving on if you require Prettech Asias contact information again please send me an email and Im happy to forward you Maria Li contact information again. Respectfully Mike 604 783 6003 text is best

reviews.review_text: In pursuing contact with Prettech Asia, they have indicated that Prettech Canada is not selling their products and will not guarantee anything Prettech Canada sells. Our company did a warranty repair for Mike in 2017 and still have not been paid for our work, despite numerous attempts to collect. Buyer beware - this company owes us over $6,000.00 and refuses to pay. As a reply to your reply: You hired us 3 years ago in 2017. This is when we did the work. We were never paid for that work. The cost of the repair was communicated throughout the process, it was inside the tank on an outlet in a very difficult to get to spot. We needed to chase the crack because each time we attempted to repair, it would spider out further. We brought in NDT testing (after you approved it) to confirm that the repair was good. We travelled to Cold Lake twice (290+KM one way) to complete this repair. We have been out of pocket for the testing, the materials required, travel and the labor for 3 years. We have attempted to collect. Asking for photos of an obscure and hard to get at part of a tank we have already repaired is unwarranted. Ask the client. His tank did not leak after the repair.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your reply Shawna, Prettech Asia was the firm I left 4 years ago for the exact reasons you have mentioned. Poor craftsmen ship and not honoring there warranty work. The work was done for Prettech Asia and once again they didnt honor there commitment. They didnt like the fact that your minor fix cost more than the whole tank. Prettech Asia owes you $6000 dollars. Im not associated with Prettech Asia in any shape or form. The tank that had the 2 inch specialty weld done on it. The value of the tank was $5200 dollars the 2 inch fix was $6000 I believe Prettech Asia asked for photos and they werent provided and the client Prettech Asia had trouble justifying there *exorbitant bill*.  Sorry to hear you have had bad luck with Prettech Asia as well. Prettech Canada has multitudes of 5 Star ratings for my commitment to the Craft Brewing Industry. I look forward to sharing with you the best welds in the industry!!!

reviews.review_text: My husband made the mistake of working with this man and company. I highly advise against it. What ever cost savings you believe you might have you will lose on the back end 10 fold.  This man is a liar and a snake and uses fake reviews to inflate his horrible 2nd hand china products.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Younique, We am sorry to hear that your husband did not enjoy his experience with us. I believe that we have attempted to address a few other reviews related to this purchase. We appreciate the feedback we have received from these reviews. As a business we value our customers happiness and will always make attempts to create a positive buying experience. While there is definitely diversity in our reviews, including not just purchasing clients, but agencies that we work alongside. All components to the business are important, and we value each review that we receive. I can assure you that any reviews that we have received are legitimate. I am sure that any of these businesses would be happy to share their experience and show off their equipment! Prettech Canada wishes you and your husband all the best, and a Happy Mothers Day!
